string.value: The description of the fit's usage
Fixed pressure connection with imperceptible clearance or small interference\nAssembled using small force\nUsed for keeper of electric motors on shafts, gears or fitted bolts
Consistent pressure connection with small clearance or with small interference\nAssembled using rubber or copper hammer\n Used for disassemble pressure connections for hubs of gears, pulleys, etc.
Shift pressure connection with small clearance and imperceptible interference\nAssembled by hand\nUsed for easily disassemble joints of gears, pulleys, sleeves, etc.

Pressure connection with a large interference
Assembled using heavy force at different
component temperatures
Used for hubs of gears or flanges connected to the shaft

Pressure connection with middle interference
Assembled using heavy force. Different
temperatures of hole and shaft is proffered.
Used for hubs of clutch discs or bearing sleeves

Shear fit connection with imperceptible clearance
Put on without larger force
Components can move by hand after lubrication
Exchangeable wheels, set-rings, circular conveyance

Shear fit connection
Put on without larger force
Components can move by hand after lubrication
Lightly disassemble portions, expanding ring,
Components of agricultural machines fixed to shafts with pivots,
screws or jacket join
Rotary fit connection with very small clearance\nAssembly-currently assembled without appreciable clearance\nSliding gears and clutch wheels or sliding rods in bearings

Rotary fit connections
Assembly-with appreciable clearance
Main fit connections for manufacturing machines
Fit connections of sliding sticks or cranked shafts
More clear rotary fit connections\nAssembly-with larger clearance\nFit connections for long collated shafts, e.g. agricultural machines

Rotary fit connection with considerable clearance
Assembly-with a large clearance
Multiple collated shafts of manufacturing and piston machines,
Shafts from melted steel circular sticks

Fit connections with a large clearance for parts with large tolerances
Assembly-with maximum clearance
Rotary plugs, bolts, furcated screws break's pull,
Fit connections for parts to be welded
